      • getColumnNames

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getColumnNames​(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase database,
                                                             java.lang.String tableName)
        Returns a set of column names for a given table name in a database.
        Parameters:
        database - the opened database.
        tableName - the tablename to look at for the columns.
        Returns:
        a set of Strings or null if the table does not exist.

      • getColumnNames

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getColumnNames​(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase database)
        Given a database products a map of tables with the associated column names
        Parameters:
        database - the database
        Returns:
        a map that has table names as keys and sets of strings as the column names for each table name.

      • isSQLiteDatabase

        public static boolean isSQLiteDatabase​(java.lang.String path)

      • getNextAutoincrementId

        public static long getNextAutoincrementId​(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase database,
                                          java.lang.String table)
        Returns the next auto-increment ID for the specified table. If the specified table does not contain an AUTOINCREMENT column, 0L will be returned.
        Parameters:
        database - A SQLite database
        table - The name of the table
        Returns:
        The next auto-increment ID or 0L if there is no AUTOINCREMENT column for the specified table.

      • getTableNames

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTableNames​(DatabaseIface database)
        Given a database, provide a set of table names
        Parameters:
        database - the database to obtain the table names from
        Returns:
        the set of strings that describe all tables in the database

      • getColumnNames

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getColumnNames​(DatabaseIface database,
                                                             java.lang.String tableName)
        Given a database and a table, return a set of all columns for that table
        Parameters:
        database - the database to use
        tableName - the table names
        Returns:
        the set of columns for the provided table otherwise null if no columns found for the provided table name.

      • getColumnNames

      • getNextAutoincrementId

        public static long getNextAutoincrementId​(DatabaseIface database,
                                          java.lang.String table)
        Returns the next auto-increment ID for the specified table. If the specified table does not contain an AUTOINCREMENT column, 0L will be returned.
        Parameters:
        database - A SQLite database
        table - The name of the table
        Returns:
        The next auto-increment ID or 0L if there is no AUTOINCREMENT column for the specified table.

      • openDatabase

        public static DatabaseIface openDatabase​(java.lang.String path,
                                         boolean readOnly)
        Opens the database from the specified existing path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the database, or null to open an in-memory database
        readOnly - true if the database should be opened as read-only, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the database interface

      • openOrCreateDatabase

        public static DatabaseIface openOrCreateDatabase​(java.lang.String path)
        Opens the database from the specified existing path. If the specified path does not exist, a new file is created.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the database, or null to open an in-memory database
        Returns:
        the database interface
